message.body: So you have probably already noticed this, but there's double AP for almost everything in Ingress right now, plus hacking blue portals gives you TONS of
xmps for the next week and a half or so. Time to hit 8!!
Adam reported this to me last week! I'm hacking away! Closing in on 8 but Adam wants to make me a 9 (big task!) it's nice not to have to be scrounging around for resonators all the time.
Isn't it though! Let me know if you want to meet up for some group ingressing. Maybe the three of us can get together before this is over.
Yeah! Are you free any tues/wed/thurs evenings? I could also wander around at lunchtime.
I could do Tuesday or Wednesday evening next week. Let me know!
Tuesday's voting day, wanna say Wednesday the 5th? Get some portals, get a beer? I can see if Adam can come too
Awesome, it's on the calendar! Adam's in too. I went portaling at lunch and the smurfs came around and knocked it down already :(
